questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unused and in their original packaging.

questions.question: How long does shipping take?
questions.answer: Shipping typically takes 5-7 business days depending on your location.

questions.question: Do you offer international shipping?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. Shipping times and costs may vary.

questions.question: Can I track my order?
questions.answer: Once your order has shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner and follow the instructions.

questions.question: Can I modify my order?
questions.answer: Once your order has been placed, it cannot be modified. Please contact support if you have an issue.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the steps to reset it.

questions.question: How do I view my order history?
questions.answer: You can view your order history by logging into your account and visiting the 'Order History' section.

questions.question: What sizes are available?
questions.answer: We offer sizes from XS to XXL. Check the sizing chart on the product page for more details.

questions.question: How do I care for my clothes?
questions.answer: Each product page includes detailed care instructions for the materials used.

questions.question: Do you offer gift cards?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer gift cards in various denominations. You can purchase them on our website.

questions.question: Are your products sustainable?
questions.answer: We are committed to sustainability and source materials that meet our environmental standards.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

questions.question: Is it safe to enter my credit card information?
questions.answer: Yes, we use secure payment gateways to ensure your information is protected.

questions.question: Can I apply a discount code to my order?
questions.answer: Yes, you can apply a discount code during checkout. Ensure the code is valid and applied correctly.

questions.question: How can I contact customer support?
questions.answer: You can reach customer support by emailing support@company.com or by calling our helpline.

questions.question: What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
questions.answer: Please contact our customer support team immediately with your order number and a photo of the damaged item.
